attributes.action: please urge the sri lankan goverment to protect human and democracy right in people in sri lanka
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we need help from internationally to protect democracy and human right in Sri lanka,
26 january 2010 sri lankan presidential election totally hijack by governing dictatorship.
opposition candidate and election commisioner house arrest by sri lankan security forces, violece carried out against oppsition supporters and journalist by governing dictatorship,
we raising our voice win our human and democracy right in sri lanka

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
